scenario_text.value:
I’d say I’m more...nervous than scared.
Still, there’s something I must do...

Yeah... Me, I’ve been so scared... My teeth
have been chattering for a while now.

Ah, Takuma. I heard from Saki that Kaito has
yet to return.
I hope he’s all right... Really, I do...

He hasn’t come back here, either.
I do worry about him.
I wonder what he’s doing now...
